description: This file defines a class E2BTools that extends Toolkit to provide sandboxed code execution, file management, and system operations using the e2b_code_interpreter Sandbox. It includes methods for running Python code, handling files, managing sandboxes, and executing shell commands, tailored for an environment that integrates with the e2b sandboxing system.

classes.name: E2BTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for sandboxed code execution, file management, and system operations using the e2b_code_interpreter Sandbox.

methods.name: run_python_code
methods.description: Executes Python code in a sandboxed environment and returns the output or error message.

methods.name: upload_file
methods.description: Uploads a local file to the sandbox environment.

methods.name: download_png_result
methods.description: Retrieves a PNG image result from the last execution and adds it as an artifact to an agent.

methods.name: download_chart_data
methods.description: Extracts chart data from execution results and optionally adds an image artifact.

methods.name: download_file_from_sandbox
methods.description: Downloads a file from the sandbox to the local system.

methods.name: run_command
methods.description: Executes a shell command in the sandbox, optionally in background.

methods.name: stream_command
methods.description: Runs a shell command and streams its output.

methods.name: run_background_command
methods.description: Runs a shell command in the background and returns a command object.

methods.name: list_files
methods.description: Lists files and directories in a specified sandbox path.

methods.name: read_file_content
methods.description: Reads the content of a file from the sandbox.

methods.name: write_file_content
methods.description: Writes text content to a file in the sandbox.

methods.name: watch_directory
methods.description: Watches a directory for changes over a specified duration.

methods.name: get_public_url
methods.description: Gets a public URL for a service running in the sandbox on a specified port.

methods.name: run_server
methods.description: Starts a server in the sandbox and returns its public URL.

methods.name: set_sandbox_timeout
methods.description: Updates the timeout setting for the sandbox.

methods.name: get_sandbox_status
methods.description: Retrieves the current status or ID of the sandbox.
